attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These sites internet sex are a disgrace! They target innocent people by attaching their family names to them. Several deceased celebrities like singer Bing Crosby have had their names attached in like manner to spread filth and drive traffic to these deplorable sites! Even politicians and living celebrities have had their names misused in this highly sensitive manner!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
